PATIENT_ID: TEST_VASC_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 20:10:00
Category I activation for 38-year-old female, gunshot wound to right thigh.
Active hemorrhage noted. Tourniquet in place from field.
BP 92/58, HR 115, RR 22. Blood transfusion started.
Hemodynamically unstable with ongoing hemorrhage.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 20:45:00
Patient taken directly to OR for vascular repair.
No CT angiography obtained prior to surgery.
No documentation of angioembolization consideration.
